title: The New Civil Rights Movement | Guests: Ken Paxton & Brad Meltzer | 5/7/20
description:
Jailed Dallas salon owner Shelley Luther has received massive support from citizens and Texas officials, including Governor Abbott. Dr. Karlyn Borysenko explains what the media on both sides have gotten wrong about the Michigan protests. Best-selling author Brad Meltzer previews his new book, “The Lincoln Conspiracy,” about the plot to kill Lincoln before the Civil War. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton argues that Shelley Luther should be released. Small business owners Joseph Tahanians and Matthew “Jax” Myers tell of the draconian measures their states’ governments took against their businesses. Head researcher Jason Buttrill lays out the facts in the story of a failed plot to capture Venezuelan dictator Nicolas Maduro.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
